titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Rhinovirus drugs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/26/1999--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on trans- (2'R,3'''S,4S,5'S) - (4-(2' - (4-fluorobenzyl) - 6' - methyl -5 ' - ((5" - methylisoxazole - 3" - carbonyl) amino) - 4 - oxoheptanoyl- amino) - 5 - (2" - oxopyrrolidin - 3" - yl) pent - 2 - enoic acid ethyl ester (rhinovirus drugs).
